import React from 'react' import "./About.css" const About = () => { return ( <>

Meet Sagar Shriwastav
Welcome to my world of technology and creativity!

Greetings and As a 4th year student in Information Technology, I have developed a deep passion for the field. Through this website, I hope to showcase my skills, projects, and experiences in a way that will resonate with potential employers and collaborators. Thank you for taking the time to explore my work!

) } export default About
